actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Expressing support for designation of April 2010 as Student Financial Aid Awareness Month to raise awareness of student financial aid.

summary.text: Supports the designation of Student Financial Aid Awareness Month. Encourages students and families across this country to participate in Student Financial Aid Awareness Month.

titles.title: Expressing support for designation of April 2010 as Student Financial Aid Awareness Month to raise awareness of student financial aid.
